values:
Again I return, dear friends, after a long hiatus. My angel has fled from me...but perhaps it is for the best. My darkness would have consumed her before too long; it is better she begin again with another more worthy man than continue down this lone road of despair with me. Do not think however that I'm not heartbroken, that the grip of lonielness does not crush my heart. But pain is bearable, at best that final reminder that we are alive and that life is not over. We must solidier on, no? In any case, now that I am truly back in the states, I'll be around a bit more frequently. Till I hear from you all again. Adieu..


The lost one

It feels so strange to be here...a little older, a little wiser, and deeply in love. An angel has rescued me from myself in so many ways, I've some difficulty expressing just how much I have to thank her for. I'm in southern N.J. now, meeting her family, exploring life outside of the Marines and rediscovering what exactly it means to be free.

What can I say...? I'm with a goddess, ladies and gentlemen. God help me, I feel like crying, cuz` I don't see life getting much better. When she looks at me, when she speaks my name...I swoon. I feel my heart flutter and knees go weak. And when we touch, hallelujah...my eyes are opened to things I never thought I'd ever get to see. My little corner of the universe, my Apex, has a point of infinite light after eras of darkness. I'll tell you more when next we meet.

An excerpt from a story I'm writing...I'm open to any commentary on it. It's a Vampire novel, to make it a little clearer for you.

                            Funny how these human beings arrayed themselves in such gaudy, tasteless colors, Derek mused, moving amongst the crowds outside the concert hall, his every cell pulsing with the throb of bass and bloodlust. How plain he must look in comparison, despite the natural paleness of his skin, the oily darkness of his hair, the unobtrusive combination of leather motorcycle jacket and ripped jeans. No painted faces, no macabre costumes, no faux paux wounds or blood for this one. He wove a silent path through the crush of the masses, holding in check his usual strength, his lithe frame finding little resistance and quite a few appreciative glances. He ignored these as he ignored everything else around him, his focus intense and singular. Her scent had led him here; somewhere among these great pretenders was the real thing. The whore, the one who'd stolen his heart along with his humanity, was not some masquerading killer. She claimed to be nothing more than she was, a cruel and destructive Harpy feeding on the lifeblood of those who took her fickle fancy. He'd come initially to rip out her black heart with his bare hands, to perish with her in a great conflagration, the only death he saw as fitting for one as sick and demented as Lilliana. Yet he could not deny a certain lust for her in his heart...tugging at him and slowly eating away at what little will he was capable of gathering for this task. His eyes, normally a ocean blue, shifted to a pure silver as he neared her, her very proximity making his body positively hum with anticipation. Several of her lesser "children" surrounded her, a vagabond gang of runaways and the unwanted. Derek snarled inwardly in a pitch no human ear could possibly detect. There was murder plain and simple in this sound and the young ones gazed around nervously, unable to gauge exactly who'd made the threatening invocation. Lilliana herself cast a cool, unaffected glance in Derek's general direction, a hint of a smile playing on her lips. If it was a bloodbath he wanted, she'd be more than happy to oblige....


I'll give you guys a bit more when next I post.


The Rest is Silence...Fear the Resonance....

Adieu

The Lost One

I'll be the first to admit that I'm having major trouble getting into the Chrsitmas spirit..that could be because I'm far from home and have no way of getting there. I've been stationed in Cherry Point, N.C. and regretably, I am unable to take leave until the first of the New Year. I have therefore elected to withdraw, to beat a hasty and much needed retreat back to my own little dark corner of the universe and bid farewell to all things pertaining to Chris Kringle. No tree, no carols, no presents, no television Christmas specials... just me, a warm bed, and a good book. Besides, this holiday has become of a commercial machine than a religious symbol anyway. I'm just not in the mood to buy in this year. I'm glad that there's no one here trying to change my mind. I can sit in peace....without the tiresome annoyance of someone saying to come to some lame-ass party or some such drivel...in any case, to those of you who are going all out, kudos and Merry Christmas to you....for me, it's just another day in the life.


The Rest is Silence...the Resonance kills...

Adieu

The Lost One

Fate has led me here...to the middle of central bumfuck Mississippi, serving in the mighty, mighty USMC. Fortunately, I've accquired myself a new laptop, complete with wireless internet so, I'll be around enough to say all I need to. I'm feeling really out of it though, losing track of days and sleep. I suppose that's all good ....if I was feeling anything else I wouldn't be me. I'm missing my dear Angel...if she finds me, perhaps the Hell that my mind trips through will at the very least be tolerable....reach for me, love for here I'll be.    




Fear not the Resonance....the Silence is what kills

Adieu

The Lost One

How nice indeed to be back in my secluded, dark axel of the universe, watching this little dustball of a world spin ever onward towards oblivion. Pessimistic view, no? But a true one, in my humble opinion.

I've no idea when exactly I became so faithless. I've been gone these past couple months, becoming embroiled in a war I do not believe in, doing things I never thought I am capable of. Perhaps I've become the monster my enemies always knew that I would. Or worse. Who's really to know? *shrugs* In any case, I cannot help being what the world has helped mold me into...a minister of death, a blade in the grasp of the supposedly holy U.S. government to be used to cut and hack its way towards its own convuluted objectives...and yet, I asked for this. The humanistic part of me, the part I've always sought to supress by turning my mind to the pursuit of cold, rigid knowledge, is still there, questing as all humans do towards the base things. Death, carnage, the inner need to conquer and control...we deny this truth to ourselves, even when confronted with evidence of it at every turn. Flip on your television to CNN and it's there glaring at you from within the screen.

So I've made a silent vow with myself. A vow not to deny what I am. A destroyer, a great consuming carnivore, ever hungry, ever thristing for the next item of prey to bring into my killing maw.


Fear not the silence....It is the resonance that kills.

Adieu

The Lost One

I wish things could be as simple and clean
as the paper that I'm spilling my soul onto
and maybe we could be innocent again
and skip all the drama that people go through
If only we were back in that room before all
the complications drove us apart, before the hard times
and the harsh words escaped the prisons of our lips
Would we still be simple and clean 
or would we still have became these shells
of ourselves, trying so hard in a quest for substance 
that we lose things that we grip so tight
Would our nights still seem longer than our days spent 
restless, our only friends the ceiling and stars outside the windows
Is that child, that trusting being still inside somewhere
wondering what happened to us, to you, to me
Maybe someday we'll find out all over again
what it is to be simple and clean

I've been feeling out of sorts lately. Two very good friends have been feuding with each other, one of whom, much to my regret, has parted ways from me. I just feels so....wrong not to be with them, the three of us. Usually I'm the peacemaker among us, but I'm simply exhausted by it all. I love them both and hate them too, for making me feel so torn. I don't want to choose sides. I just need to rest...from them.


In most other aspects, I suppose I'm fine. I'm alive, no? In pretty good health at least. Just bloody damned tired of the endless procession of day,weeks, months, years...as I suppose we all become at some point. It's just our nature to find the everyday mundane, I guess. Well, I hope all of you are doing well; drop me a line. You know my dark corner of the universe is always open.


The Rest is Silence...Fear Not the Resonance...

The Lost One

I had the oddest experince the other day. And I'm not sure how to take it.

A very good friend of mine is an amateur filmaker. (Check out BadGoneGood on myspace.com to see some of his work. He's quite talented.) He threw a party for the casts of his past few features and as one of his many creative consultants, he invited me to it. So there I was, sipping a glass of water and engaging a few of the actors in conversation when I hear a laugh. Soft and beautiful, eerie almost in its familiarity. It was the laugh of one of the first women I'd ever loved, one of those things you never forget. I nearly spilled my drink. And then she walked in, her hair the same fiery red I remembered, her face a little more careworn from the years but no less alluring than it had been all that time ago when she'd been mine. "Nora?" I said, a little afraid, wondering if this was all a figment of my imagination. She didn't recognize me until I stood up and she looked just as shocked and pleased to see me. We talked almost the entire party, reminiscing over our time together, me silently wishing things could have been different between us. We exchanged phone numbers, the kisses on the cheek friends sometimes do at goodbyes. And now I have reached a quandry. I want her....perhaps more than I ever realized. You see, we parted only because we both moved and could not hope to hold on to each other. Could this be a sign of some sort? I just get the feeling that this is something I should pursue. Maybe I'm wrong. But I'll not know until I try..


The Rest is Silence...Fear not the Resonance...

The Lost One

Merry 4/20!!!

Been awhile since I graced this place with a hello-and-well-met for all my buddies. I hope you're all well and having proper dates with Mary Jane. (the girl or the plant, either one is fine by me.) I'm doing mighty fine by most accounts. Still alive and kickin...rockin' out with my cock out, hanging out with my wang out and all that jazz. Driving life like I stole it and the Devil's riding shotgun. In any case, I'll have more to report to you al later. I do believe that I've left a certain piece of my equipment for today's festivities unattended.



                              The Rest is Silence....The Resonance comes

                                                   The Lost One

Hello, friends...

Like the new look of the place....? Cut down, streamlined and oh so fitting to my nature, wouldn't you agree? I must thank my dear Camilla for the linkage to this new layout and Ljlayouts site for their exquisite graphics. I am in your debt.

But enough about that, dear ones. I have, as the man often says, pressing matters to attend to.


Well, I'll wait till you listen
I won't say a word
to follow your instincts
just never worked for me
oh, you're silent but strong, (yeah, I'm playing that card)
and you're noticing nothing again

Now I'm lying on the table
with everything you said
keep that in mind, the way that it felt
when the most I could do was to just blame myself

(Feel it out for once and feel nothing like everyone else)
when the most I could do was to just blame myself
and I know you know, everything
I know you didn't mean it
I know you didn't mean it

I know you know, everything (drop everything)
I know you didn't mean it (start it all over)
I know you didn't mean it (remember more than you'd like to forget)

So, we're talking forever
and you almost feel better
but, better's no excuse for tonight
you see, it's never bad enough
to just leave or give up
but, its never good enough to feel right

Now I'm lying on the table
with everything you said
it will all catch up eventually
well, it caught up and honestly
the weight of my decisions
were impossible to hold
but they were never yours
they were never yours

Well I, know you know, everything
I know you didn't mean it
I know you didn't mean it

I know you know, everything (drop everything)
I know you didn't mean it (start it all over)
I know you didn't mean it (remember more than you'd like to forget)

Drop everything, start it all over
remember more than you'd like to forget [x2]

Would you like to forget? [x2]
drop everything, start it all over
well, drop everything start it all over (would you like to forget)
drop everything start it all over
start it all...

I guess this tells a lot about how I've been feeling lately. An old flame has mysteriously asked me back into her life and as usual, chaos ensues. For someone whom others see as so damned intelligent, I must be a complete retard when it comes to relationships because it seems like I keep walking into these cycles. Where I keep pursuing the wrong type of girl for me for the wrong reasons. I want love...real, unadulterated, unconditional and deeply passionate love, and all I seem to get is women who want me for sex or recognition for dating the lead singer in a band or some other crap. It makes me want to just become a hermit or agoraphile and never leave the confines of my Nest (my room for those who don't know my lingo) again. Hell...why does love have to be so hard to find and keep? Anyways, I guess this is the Gods' way of testing my poor mortal spirit. Damn it...I suck at tests.

Adieu, my lovelies....

The Rest is Silence....fear not the Resonance.

The Lost One

It's been a long time, boys and girls, since last I sojourned here...too long by all accounts.

I suppose things are as good as could be hoped for. School's going alright, my band's doing well (playing on St. Valentine's Day, actually) and I'm healthy physically, if not entirely mentally. I guess there is no REAL reason for the melancholy I feel, save that fact that plagues all true lonely souls: I am alone. No warmth of eyes, nor touch of a woman's lips adorns me. This is, friends, not for lack of searching. I know as well as any that Cupid's arrows can strike anyone with open eyes, but they seem to have all missed me. Perhaps, I've no right to complain, but it rankles that so many other less-deserving people seem to have this one thing, so small and yet so damned significant that I can not hope to grasp for myself. Why must I wander this dull earth in solitude while others know such a union of souls? Is there, God forbid, something wrong with me?

Enough of that...such speech will only deepen my sorrow. There is nothing for it in the end.

 

Adieu, my pretty ones...

 

The Rest is Silence...

The Lost One

Thursday. Morning. Cold is a silent sentinel outside, ice and snow littering the here and there. The sun cast what little pallid light it can muster over a dead world. Striking it is in its beauty, its clean, sterile emptiness...fits my mood most exquistely. Mood...(a sad smile crosses the lips) I've been told it is a thing reserved for cattle and lovemaking, but I feel that perhaps given my current circumstances, one should make allowances for the wrathful as well.

Time drifts by uncertainly, as if it seeks to avoid the anger I struggle to hold in check. It is not my friend and never has been. And even now, it works against me. I used to believe that I was free...but now I find in an old woman's ignorance the truth: We are not free. Every day we add another line, another layer to this sad grid we require to perceive the universe. We classify and label everything and that which doesn't or cannot be classified, labeled, studied...we instead fear. These filters or the lens of perception seems more and more like it is built of prejudices in today's people than at any other time. What are we now, with all this technology and supposed knowledge, that we fail to percieve another deeper world all around us? I feel as one buried still alive, clawing my way through the earth above toward some great truth just out of reach. We seek to understand a world, an existence, even our own lives in stages, dimensions, and phases. But this is in a way foolish. To gain understanding of a process, one must study it while it is in progress. I have studied the world in motion...and now it seems a myriad of conclusions fall before me, challenging me to choose one.

To be Continued...

The more things change, the more they remain the same....

Or so I've heard. I think that finally the truth of that statement is turning 'round to proverbally bite me in the 'arse. I'm searching for a place that myself and two best friends can slip into without bankrupting ourselves in the process, juggling classes at school(tons of fun...*insert sarcastic eyeroll here*), and trying to sort out feelings I should be denying anyway. I need a drink...something hard that will help burn the memory away.

I went to see my friend of the 23rd for her 21st birthday and had a blast. Almost went and killed a guy...with a borrowed blade, no less. *shrugs* I can think of worse ways to spend a Thursday night. In any case, the night was made awkward by the fact that her fiance', my best friend, was there. They both know I have major feelings for the birthday girl, but that I'm not a homewrecker, so I'll keep what I feel under wraps. Still, it's really not easy...your best friend and the girl of your dreams. It's like a badly scripted episode of Dawson's Creek. So much drama....and still I stay around, cuz' I don't wanna be a bad friend or seem like a jealous bastard.(Which I just might be...not really sure how to feel.) In any case, that's my issue...for this week. I guess that I either should deal or blow the whole fuckin' scene.

Hmmmm....a bottle of Jack D., a smoke and some Tool on the radio...my cure for a bad day.

 

Thought of the day: The very fact that flamethrowers exist suggest that somewhere, at some time, someone said, "Hey, I want to set those people over there on fire...I'm just not close enough to do it."

 

The Rest is Silence

The Lost One

I apologize for my long absence, friends...it seems like an eternity. And yet, I exist, siphoning from an existance of pain, torment, and despair what little joy there is to be had. Bah, perhaps all is a waste after all,, but that which is wasted is always reclaimed at some point or another.

I worry for those who have not sought after me, have not reached out here in the time since last I posted. To my dear Nocturnal, my arms and ears await you, a shelter and haven from your trials. To the many others, I am here and always ready for the words you seek to share...I am here always just beyond the touch of your fingers...in the dark.

 

The Rest is Silence...Fear not the Resonance

The Lost One

(This are the lyrics to the first song on our demo, the only one I wrote entirely on my own. I think it's the least strongest of our songs but it means a lot to me. There is some debate about whether to cut it or not, so I'm hoping for some feedback.)

dedicated with undying love to the memory of my dear Teresa

My reflection is a stranger
My flesh a dull reminder
A prison I surrender
If only for moments to have her

Oppression, regression
She makes me the monster
her darkest obsession
she's taking me under

(chorus)
living no meaning
no longer discerning
the voice in my head
it feels like she's burning
her name in my eyes
And I am not seeing
the ghost I sleep with
is gone from being...


Beneath it all, I do enjoy
her blackouts and white noise
What methods doth she employ
to render me another broken toy

Submission, constriction
taking away the better part of me
addiction, affliction
blind my eyes for I don't wish to see

(chorus)

(bridge)
Grant me a kinder fate than this
slow death with her name on my lips
Take this crown of tears from my head
No longer will I sleep with the dead.
Begone...Begone...Begone...

Sorry it's been so long, friends, but life's hectic pace has caught me and is dragging me along. I've met a number of beautiful people in my travels, including a very attractive and intriguing woman by the name of Bonnie.

In other news, my band has been fiercely recording the final mix of our demo, entitled Live Fast, Die Pretty and other mottoes. It's coming out better than I expected.

 

I hope to touch base with you all again soon....those of you with my e-mail, feel free to drop me a line.

 

Adieu..

You spoke without saying a word,

two souls as free as birds, taking wing under night's canopy.

You're here with me.

I breathe your name into the air,

each syllable hangs there, mesmerized

like fireflies caught in the nets

that are your eyes.

Is it me or do I see

in those deep eyes, the everything

I was, I am, I want to be

mingled with fire and with passion,

Yes, there is desire, there is need, and there is greed.

You draw so near to me, so deep within our blanket sea,

with that sweet kiss, that soft caress, with those full lips

electricity beneath my fingertips, down my spine as I lie

with the Divine. But I feel fine.

In her arms, every defense disarmed, and safe from harm.

It feels like dying, almost like flying, I am rising and I'm crying

for all the little things you make me see. This must be what it's like to be....

New worlds are coming into bloom, I see the sun, I leap the moon, I see Jupiter at noon.

My heart is swelling but there is room.

Our pulses beat and intertwine, I am yours and you are mine as I'm

running fingers through your hair, it's burning up but we don't care.

Every star and perfect thing

Every sigh and word unspoken begins to echo

like when the Seraphs sing.

Time's decided to stand still, to wait there by the windowsill,

grinning madly with the pretty smile that kills.

We fill these moments with our song,

feels too right, can't be wrong,

and maybe there was nothing wrong all along.

Just two beings of flesh and bone,

who found this place to be alone,

 to harvest the love that we have sown.

I close my eyes and see the light, we are here, we're making love

things are better than alright

Because I dreamt that you were here, so very near,

that you were here with me last night.....

 

To my lovers, past, present and future...

May you forgive my faults and sins...and remember me fondly.

The Rest is Silence....Fear not the Resonance..

The Lost One

The unthinkable has occurred.

As most of you are aware, I'm a Wiccan, something of an Earth worshiper. Thus, my most prized possession, beside my Livejournal and Dahlia( my guitar), is my Book of Shadows, a book that holds all of my spells and rituals, the very center of my practice. It has mysteriously dissappeared from its place, at the foot of my altar. The very act of moving it throws into chaos all the energies I've gathered for the act of spell-casting. And it holds far more than that...everything I've managed to gain in knowledge of the Black Arts (which I do not practice, mind you) was contained with. Curses, death charms...the potential damage is nearly limitless. I know such things should not perhaps be written, but it is a part of my duty to safeguard such knowledge as a Rune Scribe within my circle. Maybe I sound a little crazy...but if you've seen what I've seen, you know all of this works, that Magick is definitely a real force.

I suspect that Michelle took it....and her vengeful nature makes her quite a danger with such knowledge. She was once a part of our Circle and she betrayed our oath to never tap into the Black Arts before, seeking to curse a girl who'd threatened her. We bound her from doing harm and declared her exiled from the Circle, though we've struggled to maintain a friendship with her. To what purpose though could she have stolen my Book? She cannot cast anymore unless one of us removes the binding. To show to someone? My Book is not only locked with a physical lock but written in my own Runes. No one but her and someone else in my Circle would draw any meaning from what they see. In any case, I plan on getting it back. It's far too great of a danger in her hands. Still, I wonder why...why take an object of such obvious power from one who sought to keep you as a friend? This betrayal will not,by any means, go unpunished. The Circle isn't known for being forgiving of acts such as this, though I will plead for leniency.

Wish me luck...

The Rest is Silence.

Lumias Securlum es Radius Oculari Dei

The Sanctuary of Light is in the Circle that is unseen.

Blessed Be all...

The Lost One

The other side I cannot hide,

beating hearts and thoughts of homicide.

I'm hating the person you're starting to be.

You're hating the monster that you're making me.

Where can we go to settle the score?

You're feeding on flesh and asking for more.

I don't need another parasite

And so I think I'll end this tonight....

Russian roulette with the chambers full.

I don't think the sound will reach me until

I'm too far gone to care anymore.

Let me go...when the other side calls.

You can't catch me everytime I fall.

Walk away from the sound, ignore what I say.

The other side's calling and I'm leaving today.

You never listen when I said...

that I need you each time my soul bled.

Now there's blood on the carpet and brains on the ceiling.

It'll take more than bleach to begin your healing.

You clutch at my body but nobody's there

but an empty shell. And you don't really care.

Put on your face, force out a tear.

I don't give a S*** cuz' I'm not even here.

The other side has me; I found an escape.

No more depravity, no more mental rape.

No more neglect, no more head games...

No more me, only you holding blame.

I've reversed my fortunes, I've altered my fate.

I'll die as a no one...not a ward of the state,

locked in an asylum with bars on the doors.

I've seen enough, I don't see anymore.

The other side's safety, the other side's warm.

You made me cold, no shield from harm...

I'll finish this cigarette and end this silent scream,

a pull of a trigger and shot in the dark...

I'll see you in your dreams...

Good night, so called world...

Don't you have a fear...

You'll see the other side soon enough.

Maybe you're already here.

You have Black Wings! Your feathers are dark, raven black, which can also be spiny and scaly. No one really knows why your feathers are this dark, because you always conceal yourself with a bubble. A great sadness surrounds you, and you take it out on others and the world. In Spite of your beauty, your inside is twisted and dead, because you were hurt so badly that youre heart couldnt take it. Before, your wings were white, and slowly, when your life was changing, so was the color. You have no friends, because you cant let anyone get too close to you. Grief fills your heart, though anger blinds your eyes.

Does this sound like me? Am I truly this being? Perhaps in some ways I am, outside of this small, dark corner I've claimed in this vast universe. Despite my attitude towards most of humanity, I retain hope, a bit of compassion, and love in this winter-locked heart of mine...

What kind of God are you? 
Name The Lost One  
DOB   8/8/83
Favourite Color  Bioluminescent Green 
You earthly time was spent  "Laying" with the sons and/or daughters of men for hours... and days... and weeks... 
Your throne is  A great mountain wreathed in silver cloud, attended by angelic beings of light, arced with lightning and bathed in glory 
You wear  Nothing! And that is why people worship you 
Your Godly superpower is  Complete dominance and sovereignty over time and space and the infallible right to do with both as you please 
 
Me as a God? Armaggeddon, anyone?

Forgive all pretenses, love...

Your hopelessness is painful to me

as the sound of one hand clapping.

I wish to love you as powder loves fire, all consuming in embracing.

Be not afraid; these hands of mine would never harm you.

No, no, child, be not timid. I do not burn my own with the fires in

my corona eye. I keep such things for the ones outside

even as these Eyes cried...

blood.

 

Dedicated to She of the Black Roses, the Gods keep Her.

Current Mood: Melancholy in Love

Selected Music: The Funeral of Hearts --- Him

I know I've been gone for quite a period...even for one in mourning but I hope you all understand. I've missed you so much, friends and have had such ungodly omens cast before my eyes that I must tell you of them...

The first is perhaps a portent of Doom (which in a tragic sense would seem almost a welcome fate). I sat smoking a cigarette out on my balcony just before dawn, listening to the stirrings of the waking world, mind and body weary of existence. I gazed skyward at my sign in the sky, the Sickle (or tail) of the Constellation Leo, each star seemingly the point of a sword coming to claim my life. I'd already abandoned hope of sleep, in a fit of rage at the injustice of a world that seems so intent upon destroying those I love, tossed all the Ambien in my possession down the toilet. As I sat there, a crow flew through the sickle, carrying something that shined in its ebony beak...

I don't know why this seemed important enough to mention here...but there was a certain profoundness to this scene that stirred me. Perhaps I saw this little thing as far more than it was. But what if it means that the demise of the Lost One is at hand? That the cold grip of the He who claims the Dead will reach me....? No, I've too much that must be done before I go to him....I will return to England and Paris....I would see Setsuki's grave once more...and I wish to find the One in whom the Lost One is found, the one person in this world with whom I truly belong(assuming such a being exists of course.) I will see these things done....I swear it.

 

Silence, the Lone musician

to whom we all must give an ear...

His harp, the chords are made of heartstrings..

the pick is of a diamond tear.

Adieu..

The Lost One

I know that I've been neglecting you all, my friends, but the trials and tribulations of life have drained me of the will and time to be here. I promise to return fully soon and bring you all abreast of what has occurred these past few days...it's all  descending into darkness. 

A friend of mine from Eido has recently passed beyond the Veil...I'm taking my time to mourn. Trust that I will be fine and keep her name, Setsuki in your prayers.

The Rest is Silence...
Ciao
The Lost One

Hello again, my friends...welcome back to my small corner in the infinite realm of the "World". I've been gone from you so long, I feel as though I've forgotten just how good it feels to be here with the license to create order from my daily chaos....you see, my lovelies, today is my birthday. But I realize I would not have continued to this point without the aid of a few choice souls.

To my friend and fellow in the meanderings of the soul, Nocturnal Hold, I thank and love you deeply.If ever this world loses its appeal and you need a soul to lean upon, come to me and I will greet thee with open arms and eyes.

To my dear Donna, I've never met one like you...and I'm sure I never will again. You are but proof that angels do indeed walk amongst us...

Perhaps it seems rather cryptic for me to say these things...as if in some ways, I'm saying my goodbyes. But fret not...I continue on and I will always be here. I am just conflicted. Drained is more the word by the events of the past few weeks. One to whom I gave my heart has left me, the wound is deep and I feel the sting of it with each breath. I could not save her from the monster within her and that will perhaps always be my cross to bear. Many of you would say it is through no fault of my own....but if I were just stronger...perhaps things would be different. As it is, I wish for all of you to be happy this day...to do something that you haven't done and always wanted. Even if I have failed, my darlings, I wish for you to do nothing more than try. I ache, truly and painfully, and yet, I think of our precious moments together and smile almost to the point of tears. All this is put a part of the man that I am....I wouldn't change a thing.

 

One last thing of note: To those of you with unrequieted loves, act upon them...this life is far too short to harbor such passion. Do anything you can to show what lies within...the very nature of life to bring love to fruition. And to Ruby, I love you, dear heart...and I promise that one day, amidst the darkness, we shall find one another and perhaps the answers we seek.

                                     Till' Night draws us close once more,

                                                            The Lost One

Knew it all along, I guess..

It is increasingly amazing to me how life chooses to present us with these trials of the heart. Trials that demean and debase us, trials that demand we question the very fiber of what we know and what is important. I suppose, if nothing else, these are the situations meant to inspire us to be better souls. Strange that I do not feel so.

She said she desired nothing more than to be at my side, to be joined with me. She'd ended an awful relationship with a neanderthal and desired more in a mate...and so, when the Lost One came calling, she answered him with open arms, sweet caresses, and kind words. And he was happy for a time, believing in the falsehoods of emotion, the clever ruse disguised, the snare set to be sprung.

Yet she decieved him, the clever Lost One, the once feeling soul shed from the Living Tree, a dead leaf descending to the unhallowed ground for the coming of winter.

And why may we ask?

Does her heart belong still to the Beast that abused her so? That sought to crush her heart of glass with a great mace of Lies? To him that forsook her to take another? Who cast her aside like the rind of a fruit, having enjoyed the sweet nectar therein?

Why yes...of course...that is how love REALLY works, right?

But , it gets better...

She exalts the Lost One, calls him the Everything she wants and needs, after she's taken the dagger and cut out his beating heart. She says how great of a guy he is, how she acted through the words, the moments, the kisses, giving him the Grand Portrayal of the love his heart desired. How she cried because she saw how much he cared for her and could not truly return the emotion with "mind, heart and soul as you deserve."

And the Oscar for best performance in a one-sided relationship goes to...

And so, we come to the Lost One, the One of calm words, thought and understanding...what does he do?

He shows no malice...

He shows no pain...

He shows not hatred nor anger...

And why not, you ask?

Because she is so fragile, so lost like himself...troubled by demons he'd long locked away within himself. And

- drumroll-

She's a cutter... whom the Lost One dreads will harm herself under his onslaught of harsh truths. That and because somewhere inside, she admits, she does indeed love him (but who can believe that, children?) and never REALLY meant to hurt him. And because, despite the rage and despair, he loves her too...

But what can two troubled souls do together?

He wants to save her, to help her fight these demons, and to win her heart...but how when his is such a dead,withered thing...?

-le' sigh-

He'll find a way, he hopes...or die of heartache trying....

The golden state of Never Was...

Driving....

The road ahead is littered with

the bones of dreamers

dead from slumber's empty kiss.

The Golden State of Never Was

Crying...

The sky, it seems, is set aflame

while watchdogs howl

the echoing refrains

Purpose...

Little men think softly on

new machinations

marching towards the dawn.

The Golden State of Never Was...

Rising...

The ashes fall like new born snow

as angels sings of things

we'll never know

Will we

ever awake in dewdrop plains

to dance to the symphonies of our pains?

I'm hoping....

The Golden State of Never Was...

Dying...

I sprout new wings

 to steal the sun.

Casting away my pieces

to everyone....

I'm going home...

to find myself

in someone else.

To live inside and know some greater purpose...

Maybe love.....

My eyes see and do not see...

The thorn and the petal...

The stem and the leaf...

As I am in the Garden walking,

past the spider, clever hunter,

seeking flies for consumption.

Or the rabbit, weak of heart,

flying from my footfalls.

I hear and do not hear...

the fall of fledgings from the nest,

thier cries a chorus of the newly dead.

The Garden hides horrors in plain sight,

weaves a veil on the waking world.

To see it is know and lament in the knowing.

To not see is to seek salvation blind, deaf and dumb.

We all are walking...

In the Garden...

In our slumber, not conceiving..

We are as deer in the cross-hairs

of the hidden hunter, pulling the trigger.

Never hearing the flight of the bullet.

Only hearing it rend our flesh.

Life passing in its instants.

a paradox in relativity.

Alpha and Omega...

Two point joined by a crooked line...

                        Ponder my meaning as I ponder yours,

                            See in mine that which is your own...

                                For the only true damnation is ignorance...

                                     Which in itself is naught but blindness....
